content: hold in front k 2 then k 2 from cable needle k 2 p 2 row 2-4 work sts as they appear row 5 rs p2 k2 sl 2 sts onto cable needle and hold in back k 2 then k2 from cable needle p2 row 6-8 work sts as they appear repeat row 1-8 directions both gloves cast on 48 sts and divide onto three needles knit 5 row in ribbing k2 start cable pattern over the next 10 sts and continue knitting the remaining sts in the ribbing pattern after 20 total row in ribbing begin stockinette stitch but continue the cable pattern up the entire glove right glove start thumb gusset row 38 k around until pattern end k 8 sts st st place marker k2 place second marker k around row 1 k to marker slip marker m1* k to last st before marker m1 slip marker row 2 k round repeat these 2 row until 16 sts are between markers next row k to last stitch before first marker m1 -trust me on this k around to first marker slip marker off slip first st from gusset onto right needle place 14 sts for thumb gusset onto waste yarn replace slipped stitch from right needle back to left needle k2tog and continue in round until you ve reached a comfortable length minus 6 row for the ribbing k the last 6 row in ribbing bind off all stitches for thumb pick up stitches from waste yarn and using working yarn pick up two stitches from the glove side k in the round 4 row or desired length k in ribbing 2 row bind off all stitches weave in ends and you re done with your first mitt left glove if you would like the cables to be symmetric on both gloves start the pattern on the left glove with row 5 in the chart continue as above thumb gusset row 38 k to 10 sts before pattern begin place marker k2 place second marker k 8 in st st k pattern k around continue as above *m1 to add a stitch without getting a hole just knit into the loop made by the stitch under the next stitch and then knit the next stitch on the left needle if you don t understand my directions then go to http //www knittinghelp
